uk.co.caprica.vlcj.binding

Class LibVlcFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.binding.LibVlcFactory

  • public class LibVlcFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory that creates interfaces to the libvlc native library.

    For example: 

       LibVlc libvlc = LibVlcFactory.factory().create();
    Or: 
       LibVlc libvlc = LibVlcFactory.factory().atLeast("1.2.0").log().create();

    • Method Summary

      • atLeast

        public LibVlcFactory atLeast(java.lang.String version)
        Request that the libvlc native library be of at least a particular version.

        The version check can be disabled by specifying the following system property: 

           -Dvlcj.check=no
        Parameters:
        version - required version
        Returns:
        factory

      • create

        public LibVlc create()
        Create a new libvlc native library instance.
        Returns:
        native library instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if a minimum version check was specified and failed
